## ElProps type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ElProps<TConfig extends AdapterConfig> = {
    instrument?: (impl: ElFactory<TConfig>['impl'], instrumentation: InstrumentationContext, context: ServiceContext) => ElFactory<TConfig>['impl'];
};
```
